availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob Young (Louisville, Kentucky, hackman and policeman)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, policeman. Native of Germany. Policeman in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 11, p. 447B.
"Jacob Young (1833-1883)," Find A Grave, Memorial 118988372, accessed August 24, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/118988372.
